channel.title: Massive help please!
channel.description:
Okay... i have Magic tree who give 800k each drops.... but the Normal Trees and all others tree give the same ammount... I want that the Normal tree give 100k , maple give 250k and yew 500k.... how do i fix that???
Thank you

item.title: Massive help please!
item.dc:creator: @k0j0e k0j0e

if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction >= 1600)
&& (IsCutting == true)) {
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
addSkillXP(woodcutting[2],
playerWoodcutting);
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
sM(“You get some money.”);
addItem(woodcutting[4], 800000);
attackTimer += 0;
} else {

and its for all of them…

item.title: Massive help please!
item.dc:creator: @k0j0e k0j0e
item.description:
@k0j0e wrote:

// Dead Tree
pEmote = 0x284;
woodcutting[0] = 1;
woodcutting[1] = 1;
woodcutting[2] = 800;
woodcutting[4] = -1;
break;

	case 2023:
		// Achey Tree
		pEmote = 0x284;
		woodcutting[0] = 2;
		woodcutting[1] = 1;
		woodcutting[2] = 800;
		woodcutting[4] = 2862;
		break;
	case 1281:
	case 3037:
		// Oak Tree
		pEmote = 0x284;
		woodcutting[0] = 3;
		woodcutting[1] = 15;
		if (misc.random(2) == 1) {
			woodcutting[2] = 900;
		} else {
			woodcutting[2] = 1000;
		}
		woodcutting[4] = 1521;
		break;

	case 1308:
	case 5551:
	case 5552:
	case 5553:
		// Willow Tree
		pEmote = 0x284;
		woodcutting[0] = 4;
		woodcutting[1] = 30;
		if (misc.random(2) == 1) {
			woodcutting[2] = 2000;
		} else {
			woodcutting[2] = 2000;
		}
		woodcutting[4] = 1519;
		break;

	case 1292:
		// Dramen Tree
		if(q1 == 3){
		pEmote = 0x284;
		woodcutting[0] = 5;
		woodcutting[1] = 36;
		woodcutting[2] = 2000;
		woodcutting[4] = 771;
		} else
		sM("You will need to kill 1 tree spirit before cutting this tree.");
		break;

	case 1307:
	case 4674:
		// Maple Tree
		pEmote = 0x284;
		woodcutting[0] = 2;
		woodcutting[1] = 45;
		woodcutting[2] = 4000;
		woodcutting[4] = -1;
		break;

	case 2289:
	case 4060:
		// Hollow Tree
		pEmote = 0x284;
		woodcutting[0] = 7;
		woodcutting[1] = 45;
		if (misc.random(2) == 1) {
			woodcutting[2] = 82;
		} else {
			woodcutting[2] = 83;
		}
		woodcutting[4] = 3239;
		break;
	case 1309:
		// Yew Tree
		pEmote = 0x284;
		woodcutting[0] = 9;
		woodcutting[1] = 60;
		woodcutting[2] = 4000;
		woodcutting[4] = 1515;
		woodcutting[5] = 3;
		break;

	case 1306:
		// Magic Tree
		pEmote = 0x284;
		woodcutting[0] = 10;
		woodcutting[1] = 75;
		woodcutting[2] = 5000;
		woodcutting[4] = 995;
		break;

Read full topic

Can you post your woodcutting codes? Go to your Client.Java and search woodcutting and look for this

Or something like it.
